description.value:
You bring your booted foot down on the ground with enough force to rattle your foes. Each creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your turn.

Failure The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Critical Failure The creature is knocked prone and takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage from the fall.
